SphereGeometry Class

Extends SliceSimplexGeometry
Defined in: src/davinci-eight/geometries/SphereGeometry.ts:204
Module: EIGHT

Constructs a geometry consisting of triangular simplices based on spherical coordinates.

Constructor

SphereGeometry

(
  • [radius = 1]
  • [axis]
  • [phiStart]
  • [phiLength = 2 * Math.PI]
  • [thetaStart = 0]
  • [thetaLength = Math.PI]
)

Defined in src/davinci-eight/geometries/SphereGeometry.ts:204

Parameters:

  • [radius = 1] Number optional
  • [axis] VectorE3 optional
  • [phiStart] VectorE3 optional
  • [phiLength = 2 * Math.PI] Number optional
  • [thetaStart = 0] Number optional
  • [thetaLength = Math.PI] Number optional

Methods

boundary

(
  • [times]
)
SimplexGeometry

Inherited from SimplexGeometry: src/davinci-eight/geometries/SimplexGeometry.ts:141

Applies the boundary operation to each Simplex in this instance the specified number of times.

The boundary operation converts simplices of dimension n to n - 1. For example, triangles are converted to lines.

Parameters:

  • [times] Number optional

    Determines the number of times the boundary operation is applied to this instance.

Returns:

subdivide

(
  • [times]
)
SimplexGeometry

Inherited from SimplexGeometry: src/davinci-eight/geometries/SimplexGeometry.ts:175

Applies the subdivide operation to each Simplex in this instance the specified number of times.

The subdivide operation creates new simplices of the same dimension as the originals.

Parameters:

  • [times] Number optional

    Determines the number of times the subdivide operation is applied to this instance.

Returns:

Number private

Inherited from SimplexGeometry: src/davinci-eight/geometries/SimplexGeometry.ts:38

The dimensionality of the simplices in this geometry.

CartesianE3 private

Inherited from Geometry: src/davinci-eight/geometries/Geometry.ts:12

R1 private

Defined in src/davinci-eight/geometries/SphereGeometry.ts:187

axis

CartesianE3

Inherited from AxialSimplexGeometry: src/davinci-eight/geometries/AxialSimplexGeometry.ts:12

The symmetry axis used for geometry generation.

curvedSegments

Number

Inherited from SimplexGeometry: src/davinci-eight/geometries/SimplexGeometry.ts:46

Specifies the number of segments to use in curved directions.

data

Simplex[]

Inherited from SimplexGeometry: src/davinci-eight/geometries/SimplexGeometry.ts:22

The geometry as a list of simplices. A simplex, in the context of WebGL, will usually represent a triangle, line or point.

flatSegments

Number

Inherited from SimplexGeometry: src/davinci-eight/geometries/SimplexGeometry.ts:54

Specifies the number of segments to use on flat surfaces.

k

Number

Inherited from SimplexGeometry: src/davinci-eight/geometries/SimplexGeometry.ts:88

The dimensionality of the simplices in this geometry.

The k parameter affects geometry generation.

k must be an integer.

meta

GeometryMeta

Inherited from SimplexGeometry: src/davinci-eight/geometries/SimplexGeometry.ts:30

Summary information on the simplices such as dimensionality and sizes for attributes. This data structure may be used to map vertex attribute names to program names.

orientationColors

Boolean

Inherited from SimplexGeometry: src/davinci-eight/geometries/SimplexGeometry.ts:62

Specifies that the geometry should set colors on vertex attributes for visualizing orientation of triangles
